title: SBF off-cell meetings and laptops allowed amid trial turmoil
description: According to a court filing on August 22, Judge Lewis Kaplan of the US District Court has granted permission for Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF), the founder of cryptocurrency exchange FTX, to meet with his lawyers outside his jail cell. This decision comes after SBF’s lawyers requested that he be allowed to spend time out of jail ... Read more

title: Binance Bridge Hacker Faces $30M Liquidation on Venus Amid Crypto Market Crash
description: The Venus Finance community had passed a governance proposal to whitelist the liquidation of the BNB-bridge exploiter’s position. Venus is the second-largest DeFi protocol on the BNB Chain network with nearly $600M in TVL. The leading cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume and registered users, Binance, often faces security challenges that threaten its customersâ€™ assets. As [...]
